# GradTensor

> Build production-ready AI agents and RAG systems. Fast-track to AI job readiness through practical, project-focused learning with live cohorts.

GradTensor is an AI education company that trains final-year students, fresh graduates, and working professionals to become job-ready AI engineers. Based in India, GradTensor offers live online cohort-based and skill-based courses focused on hands-on, project-driven learning.

## What Makes GradTensor Different

- Courses are taught by practitioners who build AI systems in production
- Every course results in deployed, portfolio-ready projects
- Curriculum is designed around what companies actually ask in AI engineering interviews
- Small cohorts with live instruction, not pre-recorded videos
- Covers the full stack: LLMs, embeddings, RAG, AI agents, prompt engineering, deployment

## Courses Offered

### AI Engineering & Agentic Foundations (6 weeks)
- Category: Skill-Based
- Duration: 6 weeks, 24 live hours + 24 project hours
- Topics: How LLMs work, APIs & embeddings, prompt engineering, RAG pipelines, AI agents, LangGraph
- Projects: RAG chatbot with custom knowledge base, AI agent with tool orchestration
- Ideal for: Final-year students and working professionals adding AI skills
- URL: https://gradtensor.com/courses/ai-engineering-agentic-foundations

### AI Foundations - Job Ready in 16 Weeks
- Category: Cohort-Based
- Duration: 16 weeks, 64 live hours + 96 project hours
- Topics: Python, ML basics, neural networks, LLMs, RAG, AI agents, prompt engineering, fine-tuning, deployment, Docker
- Projects: Neural network from scratch, RAG system, AI agent, end-to-end capstone
- Ideal for: Students with 6+ months runway, career switchers, professionals upskilling
- URL: https://gradtensor.com/courses/ai-foundations-job-ready-16-weeks

### AI-Ready Engineer (2 weeks)
- Category: Skill-Based
- Duration: 2 weeks, 8 live hours + 4 project hours
- Topics: How AI systems work, RAG architecture, document intelligence, project defence
- Projects: Document Intelligence Bot using RAG architecture
- Ideal for: Final-year students and fresh graduates preparing for placements
- URL: https://gradtensor.com/courses/ai-ready-engineer

## Target Audience

- Final-year engineering students preparing for campus placements
- Fresh graduates looking to stand out in AI job interviews
- Working professionals switching to or upskilling in AI careers
- Anyone who wants to build and deploy real AI systems, not just watch tutorials

## Trainers

### Prabhu Eshwarla
- AI Systems Architect and published author (Manning Publications, Packt)
- 20+ years in engineering and leadership across distributed systems, blockchain, and enterprise platforms
- Former senior leader at Hewlett Packard, former CTO of a European blockchain startup
- Master's in Engineering from BITS, Pilani
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/peshwarla
- Substack: https://trustandreason.substack.com
